name: Tileflipper
description:
Graphical interactive toy inspired by a webapp that I saw once but could never find again. Would love to speak with the original creator that inspired this! 

This toy is mouse controlled. Click on a tile (or many!) to rotate the tile clockwise. If the tip of the object hits another tip and that other one isn't currently rotating, it will rotate that one too. 

Press R to reset, Escape to exit.

Please comment if you'd like me to add anything to it!

(Made in Gamemaker Studio 2)
